name: KI_RIDER[PSY]
description:
A SHMUP inspired by the cyberpunk shoots 1980s, pixel art, challenging difficulty and cool retrowave music !

 "LADA must stop MIXIE who is jealous of his kinetic powers to steal destructive machines in the laboratory of their father!"

Follow the path of MIXIE with LADA in the story mode , challenging and with lot of boss !

Finish it to unlock the BOSS MODE challenge with new mechas and try to do the biggest score !


If you like this game follow my page to help me to create more contents !
